column4: Hi, I would like to install lightdm on my natty is it safe? Will I get the same appearance of lightdm as in oneiric?
I would like to install lightdm on my natty ,is it safe? Will I get the same appearance of lightdm as in oneiric? Someone advice me !
can someone suggest whether should I install lightdm on natty? Is someone kind enough to answer?
try it, if it doesn't work then you can uninstall it
